== Concept ==

The <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|Lubuntu Artwork Team]]</nowiki> is pleased to announce the brand new Trusty Tahr theme. With this release we're looking our "roots", the well-known Lubuntu blueish wave, but a bit more colourful, not only at the background, but the icons too.

<nowiki>[[ attachment:screenshot.png | <nowiki>[[File:screenshot_mini.png]]</nowiki></nowiki> ]]

== Wallpaper ==

Choose your tone, a colourful blue and purple wave, a more traditional saturated blue, and a desaturated version.<<BR>>Oh, and don't forget the Community wallpapers, those submitted by users and fans!
